reviews.comment: Always greatly appreciated and arrive on time!
Beautiful flowers every time. I have had many bunches from here and they never fail.
Highly recommended to anyone who enjoys colorful and vivid flowers!

Two lots of sunflowers ordered last week, one for friends' birthday and one for my anniversary, one only lasted the weekend and the other only 3 days? Expected longer as sunflowers are sturdier than most flowers. Not very good value for money.

I’ve used loads of florist websites over the years and had an awful time with all but one of them: Bloom. Time and time again they deliver great quality flowers that last longer than any others I’ve bought and they’re nearly always beautiful (now and again they need a bit of a spruce!). I go back to Bloom every time - the only thing that lets them down is the delivery service they use, which sometimes doesn’t handle flowers as they should!!
I am very happy with the service.
I've used Bloom a couple of times now and never been disappointed. Flowers are always beautiful and arrive on time.
